Activity: Log in to the EHR system and check for any updates or messages.
Set up the vaccination station and prepare supplies.
Administer influenza vaccinations and document details in the EHR.
Educate patients on influenza prevention and treatment.
Continue with vaccinations and patient education.
Review and finalize all EHR entries for the week.
Email @pchmp-1 to discuss any patient feedback or concerns regarding vaccinations.
Organize and restock supplies for the following week.
Check out with the clinical lead (@clinlead-1) to summarize the week's activities and discuss any follow-ups.
